text: Doctor Neo Periwinkle Cortex is the main villain of the Crash Bandicoot franchise. He was voiced by Clancy Brown and Lex Lang. ==Fictional biography== Neo Cortex became a mad scientist and made an Evolvo-Ray where he can mutate animals into mutants. He used it on Crash Bandicoot, but Crash escaped. ==Reception== A lot of people liked Cortex as a villain.
